Description: As a user i want to visualize the interstellar clouds
As a user i want to visualize orbit of the entities if present
As a user i want to visualize collisions between entities
As a user i want to visualize the life cycle of the entities
As a user i want to visualize relevant information about each entity
As a user i want to visualize some statistics about the simulation
As a user i want to pause and resume the simulation
